name: Fallevator
description:
You are in an elevator and you are falling. You can't jump right before the elevator hits the ground. But not in this game!

Your goal here is to jump right before the falling timer hits zero. Sounds easy? Okay, some stuff is falling with you on your head - avoid it. The more you play,  the faster they will fall (and more often!).

This game was made in one day and has only 98 lines of code. That's why before the fall the timer shows -0.02 instead of 0 c:
